channel.title: How to forward a call from a cellphone through a computer to another person?
channel.description: Title sums it up basically. I want to be able to call a land line that is hooked up to my computer, then have it forward the call to another number (One I specify maybe as an extension?). I want to do this to save money on international calls. Anyone have any ideas or know any programs that do this?

item.title: How to forward a call from a cellphone through a computer to another person?
item.dc:creator: @cause cause
item.description:
@cause wrote:

ok so i call a skype line and it forwards me, doesn’t matter. Any ideas?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 15, 2008, 02:19:03 pm[/size][hr]Sorry for the double post, but does anyone know anything that could help me?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2008, 12:09:45 am[/size][hr]Anyone have anything?

Read full topic

item.title: How to forward a call from a cellphone through a computer to another person?
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

Mopman:

Why have the landline at all? Just use a VOIP service… even Skype?

Skype is great, but you have to pay to call lanlines.

Skype to Skype calls are free though.

(Im sure you already knew that, I just wanted to elaborate on your post a bit. :rolleyes:)

Read full topic
